alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; Oklahoma; Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 04 at 10:18PM CDT until May 06 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Oklahoma, including the following counties, Lincoln, Logan, Oklahoma, Payne and Pottawatomie. * WHEN...Until 130 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1018 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Shawnee, Cushing, Chandler, Stroud, Prague, Luther, Meeker, Davenport, Wellston, Carney, Tryon, Agra, Johnson, Sparks, Warwick, Kendrick, Fallis, Avery, Parkland and Aydelotte. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
